content.text:
[@alanna](@6OxffMLNyxkboLjCqv29WnMPhH8O3qFrcXCR6KrKcPI=.ed25519)

I might recommend just leaving the app open for an hour or two so it can sync in the background, if you can. I had that bug a handful of times and kept creating new profiles (Android multitasking button -> app icon -> app info -> clear storage) but it kept doing the same thing, so eventually I:

- got a pub invite (I think to [@cel](@f/6sQ6d2CMxRUhLpspgGIulDxDCwYD7DzFzPNr7u5AU=.ed25519)'s VPS)
- waited about an hour for it to sync up with the pub
- followed *only* my profile
- waited another hour or so

Let me know if there's anything I can do to help!
